name: Drone Bay Conversion
desc:
Removing the need for crew makes room for additional drone fighters and a dedicated C&C core. This improves drone speed by %s, and decreases damage taken by %s.

Decreases the minimum crew required by %s per bay to account for pilots and bay crews. Decreases the ordnance point cost of drones by %s.

Can not be installed on frigates, phase ships, or ships that don't already have proper fighter bays.
